```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
setwd(paste0(here::here(), "/6-InToxSa_paper/Generate_datasets"))
getwd()
```

Here we prepare supp table 3 with GWAS output parameters. This will be an Excel spreadsheet with 5 sheets: phenotype. lineages, lineages test, mutations test, gene burden test

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(writexl)
rm(list = ls())
```

# Import phentype

```{r}
pheno <- readRDS("../GWAS/Phenotypes/processed_data/toxicity_phenotype_with_norm.Rda") %>%
  select(sample_id, pi_auc = untransformed, pi_auc_transformed = yeo_johnson)

supp_table3_prepare <- list(phenotype = pheno)
```

# Lineages

```{r}
lineages <- readRDS("../GWAS/Lineages/processed_data/MDS/df_mds_mash.Rda")

supp_table3_prepare$lineages <- lineages
```

# Lineage effects

```{r}
lineage_eff <- read_csv("../GWAS/Lineages/processed_data/lineage_effects_data.csv")
supp_table3_prepare$`lineage effects` <- lineage_eff
```

# Gene burded test

```{r}
pyseer_genes <- readRDS("../GWAS/pyseer_output/processed_data/pyseer_output_toxicity_genes.Rda")

supp_table3_prepare$`gene burden test` <- pyseer_genes
```


# Export as supplementary table

```{r}
supp_table3_prepare %>%
  write_xlsx("processed_data/supp_table_3/supp_table_3.xlsx")
```
